name: A Summerhouse Inn

reviews.title: The Summerhouse Inn was Great
reviews.text: Our group of 50 plus people (including 18 middle schoolers) stayed at the Summerhouse Inn for 5 days. I don't believe we could have found a more accommodating staff anywhere. Anything we needed or asked for was provided for immediately. The rooms were neat and clean. Probably one of the best things was the large grassy courtyard in between the buildings where the kids played football, soccer, frisbee, etc. I would highly recommend the Summerhouse Inn.

reviews.title: Nasty
reviews.text: We picked this place because we needed a last-minute room at a fair price ($79 plus tax), and most places were booked because the Final Four tournament was going on in Indianapolis. The room seemed okay upon arrival - a typical small motel room, about the same in layout/size as a room at the Red Roof Inn. The smell of disinfectant was strong, but that didn't seem to be too much of a problem. When we turned the heater on - it was unseasonably cold that weekend - an overwhelming mildewy odor poured out of the heater. It was awful. We immediately went back down to the front desk, informed the clerk we would not stay and explained why, and asked for our money back. Then we went ut to the Four Winds Resort and Marina, and got a much better room for only about $40 more. The Summerhouse Inn is a dump - do yourself a favor and spend a little extra to get a decent room for the night.

reviews.title: A very nice stay
reviews.text: Fireside? Best Western? New to "A Summerhouse Inn" and it was a nice stay. Okay, it's not "the Ritz", but it was clean and no problem with "smelly"! We were visiting the college with our daughter and found the staff to be really pleasant and helpful. No problem with the bill either. Breakfast was included with a "help yourself" style which we found to be a nice touch. For the price, which is difficult to find in this area, it's a good choice. :)

reviews.title: Worst Hotel--Please do not stay there
reviews.text: This was the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. The customer service was terrible. I charaged $107 to my credit card, and the employees later changed my total to $157 without notifying me. The manager refused to change the charge to what I orginally owed and was very vulgar to me. The hotel itself was disgustingly unattractive and dirty. The room (a non-smoking room) reeked of smoke and the floor was dirty. I would reccomend staying in a cardboard box rather than at this dump.

description: Nestled in the rolling hills of southern Indiana, A Summerhouse Inn is reminiscent of a simpler time. Our lush courtyard invites you to socialize around the barbecue, roast marshmallows, play games, and take advantage of our outdoor pool. Beautiful Lake Monroe and bustling Indiana University are just moments away. We offer a clean, friendly, welcoming atmosphere in a park-like setting. We work diligently to please our guests in our clean, well-maintained and relaxing environment. We are a limited service Inn and will happily tailor our service for your group; for example, you can arrange to use our kitchen for a picnic or set up our Coaches Room to review your game films. We have other family friendly features such as a functional, clean, free laundry room. Our lobby closes late in the evening and reopens early in the morning. Come stay with us and enjoy Bloomington, Indiana University and delightfully scenic southern Indiana.
